verses.verse: O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall I <S%H7768>cry,<s%> and you will not <S%H8085>hear!<s%> even <S%H2199>cry<s%> out to you of <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and you will not <S%H3467>save!<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> do you <S%H7200>show<s%> me <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and cause me to <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H5999>grievance?<s%> for <S%H7701>spoiling<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> are <S%H5048>before<s%> me: and there are that <S%H5375>raise<s%> up <S%H7379>strife<s%> and <S%H4066>contention.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H6313>slacked,<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> does <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth:<s%> for the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> does <S%H3803>compass<s%> about the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H6127>wrong<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3318>proceeds.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold<s%> you among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H5027>regard,<s%> and <S%H8539>wonder<s%> <S%H8539>marvelously:<s%> for I will <S%H6466>work<s%> a <S%H6467>work<s%> in your days <S%H3117><s%>which you will not <S%H539>believe,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> it be <S%H5608>told<s%> you.

For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> I <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> that <S%H4751>bitter<s%> and <S%H4116>hasty<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> which shall <S%H1980>march<s%> through the <S%H4800>breadth<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the dwelling <S%H4908>places<s%> that are not their's.
They are <S%H366>terrible<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful:<s%> their <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and their <S%H7613>dignity<s%> shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> of themselves.

Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> also are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than the <S%H5246>leopards,<s%> and are more <S%H2300>fierce<s%> than the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves:<s%> and their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H6335>spread<s%> themselves, and their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far;<s%> they shall <S%H5774>fly<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H2363>hastens<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> for <S%H2555>violence:<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall <S%H4041>sup<s%> up as the <S%H6921>east<s%> wind, and they shall <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

And they shall <S%H7046>scoff<s%> at the <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and the <S%H7336>princes<s%> shall be a <S%H4890>scorn<s%> to them: they shall <S%H7832>deride<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4013>strong<s%> <S%H4013>hold;<s%> for they shall <S%H6651>heap<s%> <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> it.

<S%H227>Then<s%> shall his <S%H7307>mind<s%> <S%H2498>change,<s%> and he shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H816>offend,<s%> imputing <S%H2098>this<s%> his <S%H3581>power<s%> to his <S%H430>god.<s%>

Are you not from <S%H6924>everlasting,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One?<s%> we shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you have <S%H7760>ordained<s%> them for <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and, O <S%H6697>mighty<s%> <S%H6697>God,<s%> you have <S%H3245>established<s%> them for <S%H3198>correction.<s%>

You are of <S%H2889>purer<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than to <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H3201>can<s%> not <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> <S%H5999>iniquity:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> you on them that deal <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and <S%H2790>hold<s%> your <S%H2790>tongue<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>devours<s%> the man that is more <S%H6662>righteous<s%> than he?
And <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> as the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> as the <S%H7431>creeping<s%> things, that have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over them?

They <S%H5927>take<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> of them with the <S%H2443>angle,<s%> they <S%H1641>catch<s%> them in their <S%H2764>net,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> them in their <S%H4365>drag:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> and are <S%H1523>glad.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to their <S%H2764>net,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to their <S%H4365>drag;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> by them their <S%H2506>portion<s%> is <S%H8082>fat,<s%> and their <S%H3978>meat<s%> <S%H1277>plenteous.<s%>
Shall they <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H7324>empty<s%> their <S%H2764>net,<s%> and not <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H1471>nations?<s%>
